sentences.sentence: Why are you here? Haven’t I suffered enough already after my husband’s death yesterday?
You found a ring in his apartment? Oh, no... I didn’t want this to come out, especially not now.
Yes, Father Julien and I... we’ve been involved. It started long before my husband’s death.
I was trapped in a loveless marriage, and he... he was there for me in ways I desperately needed.
I never imagined it would end like this. My husband’s death, this revelation... it’s all too much.
